Spark KBS067 Toyota Celica LB Turbo 1973 Fuji 1000 km Winner K. Misaki/H. Takahashi

Purchased: 2014

Despite heavy rain and fog, Kiyoshi Misaki and Harukuni Takahasi won a shortened 1973 Fuji 1000 km by just over 2 minutes. This was the only Fuji 1000km win for the 300hp turbo Celica.

Check out this testing/practice video with some custom fender flare work at 7:15: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eLk0KcwLgYs
